About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Full Stack Developer

A passion for web development and technology and always looking to innovate. I am a self-taught developer that started in education teaching kids then got fascinated with building websites and small hardware programs. I was always curious on how things worked, especially on the backend, so I wanted to build something that was useful for everyday life. I soon discovered that I wanted to focus on building web applications that people valued.

Wae Tech Solutions

Front-end Developer

Currently, build websites for clients. Contractor for projects for businesses.

Web Designer
